articles.content:

articles.title: QR code has been reborn in the time of COVID-19 - The CEO Magazine
articles.description: The QR code, invented in 1994, is everywhere once again because of the coronavirus pandemic as authorities use it as a tracing tool
articles.content:
The QR code is back with a vengeance in this time of the coronavirus pandemic.
